content:
### changing keymap:
```
xmodmap -e "keycode 65 = space space space space"
```

<hr>

### check fingerprint of apk package:
```
keytool -printcert -jarfile file.apk
```

<hr>

Change icon

```
sudo gedit /usr/share/applications/codium.desktop
```
`Icon=/home/finolino/Public/Icon/js.png`

<hr>

Suspend Delay

```
gsettings set org.gnome.settings-daemon.plugins.power sleep-inactive-ac-timeout 300
```
```
gsettings set org.gnome.settings-daemon.plugins.power sleep-inactive-battery-timeout 300
```
`put time in seconds`

<hr>
